Of course, you might ask what qualifies a novel to be called a techno-thriller. Definitions seem to vary. But I add a further criterion to the definition. For me, a techno-thriller must be grounded in known science. It might represent far-future developments. But the technology portrayed must be credibly linked to the principles of physics and biology. Hard science fiction, in other words.
